events.details: Ill gains - The Meat of the prey makes the hunter ill
events.result: If the roll fails, the target is Wounded

events.details: Rival predator - Avoid becomming the hunted
events.result: If the roll fails, the target is Wounded

events.details: Last throes - Get injured by your slain prey
events.result: If the roll fails, the target is Wounded

events.details: Flanked - Another beast or animal of the same type attacks
events.result: If the roll fails, the target is Wounded

events.details: Dragged - The prey drags the hunter a distance
events.result: If the roll fails, the target is Wounded

events.details: Faulty Trap - A trap set by the hunter injures them
events.result: If the roll fails, the target is Wounded

events.details: Unclean kill - THe kill is particularly gruesome and agonizing
events.result: If the roll fails, everyone in the Company gains 1 Shadow point (Dread).

events.details: Ghostly prey - The company may see ghosts of the prey
events.result: If the roll fails, everyone in the Company gains 1 Shadow point (Dread).

events.details: Hunting rounds - Traverse grisly hunting grounds of a beast
events.result: If the roll fails, everyone in the Company gains 1 Shadow point (Dread).

events.details: Fading vigour - Hunt to gain sustenance or starve
events.result: If the roll fails, everyone in the Company gains 1 Shadow point (Dread).

events.details: Misfired shot - Accidentally injured an innocent bystander
events.result: If the roll fails, everyone in the Company gains 1 Shadow point (Dread).

events.details: Fell beast - Only bring back meat o fa corrupted beast
events.result: If the roll fails, everyone in the Company gains 1 Shadow point (Dread).

events.details: Mismanaged Provisions - Hunt to replensih stores
events.result: If the roll fails, the target gains 1 Shadow point (Dread).

events.details: Lost Equipment - Hunting gear gets lost
events.result: If the roll fails, the target gains 1 Shadow point (Dread).

events.details: Questionable forage - Forage that seemed appetizing turns foul
events.result: If the roll fails, the target gains 1 Shadow point (Dread).

events.details: Lost quarry - Follow its tracks or lose it
events.result: If the roll fails, the target gains 1 Shadow point (Dread).

events.details: Stench - The kill leaves the hunter with a foul stench
events.result: If the roll fails, the target gains 1 Shadow point (Dread).

events.details: Trampled camp - The prey destroys the camp if not careful
events.result: If the roll fails, the target gains 1 Shadow point (Dread).

events.detail: Sparce wildlife - Forage what you can
events.result: If the roll fails, add 1 day to the length of the journey, and the target gains 1 additional Fatigue.

events.detail: In the thicket - The prey wanders into a hazardous terrain
events.result: If the roll fails, add 1 day to the length of the journey, and the target gains 1 additional Fatigue.

events.detail: Faulty equipment - Take time to repair hunting gear
events.result: If the roll fails, add 1 day to the length of the journey, and the target gains 1 additional Fatigue.

events.detail: Elusive quarry - Hunt to track it down
events.result: If the roll fails, add 1 day to the length of the journey, and the target gains 1 additional Fatigue.

events.detail: No luck - Traps don’t seem to work
events.result: If the roll fails, add 1 day to the length of the journey, and the target gains 1 additional Fatigue.

events.detail: Disturbed wildlife - A hasty retreat is necessary
events.result: If the roll fails, add 1 day to the length of the journey, and the target gains 1 additional Fatigue.

events.detail: Game trail - Hunting to traverse the path
events.result: If the roll succeeds, reduce the length of the journey by 1 day.

events.detail: Forage path - Forage grows along a short cut
events.result: If the roll succeeds, reduce the length of the journey by 1 day.

events.detail: Rich bounty - Especially energy-rich or quick meals
events.result: If the roll succeeds, reduce the length of the journey by 1 day.

events.detail: Animal guide - Follow at a distance
events.result: If the roll succeeds, reduce the length of the journey by 1 day.

events.detail: Lucky short cut - The hunter discovers a short cut while hunting
events.result: If the roll succeeds, reduce the length of the journey by 1 day.

events.detail: Beastly help - A beast creates a short cut
events.result: If the roll succeeds, reduce the length of the journey by 1 day.

events.detail: Lone hunter - Trade stories
events.result: If the roll succeeds, reduce the length of the journey by 1 day.

events.detail: Hunting party - Trade provisions and gear
events.result: If the roll succeeds, reduce the length of the journey by 1 day.

events.detail: Domesticated animal - Encounter of some domesticated animal
events.result: If the roll succeeds, reduce the length of the journey by 1 day.

events.detail: Noble beast - Hunting to commune with it
events.result: If the roll succeeds, reduce the length of the journey by 1 day.

events.detail: Helpful predator - A predator tolerates the help of the Hunter
events.result: If the roll succeeds, reduce the length of the journey by 1 day.

events.detail: Fine prey - Hunter encounters a particular fine prey
events.result: If the roll succeeds, reduce the length of the journey by 1 day.

events.detail: Majestic creatures - Observe without startling them
events.result: If the roll succeeds, everyone in the Company regains 1 Hope.

events.detail: Rare foraging - Very rare foraging (like rare medicinal herbs)
events.result: If the roll succeeds, everyone in the Company regains 1 Hope.

events.detail: Elven hunter or Great Eagle - Noble elven hunter or Great Eagle high above
events.result: If the roll succeeds, everyone in the Company regains 1 Hope.

events.detail: Abundant foraging - Hunting to replenish the rations of the Company
events.result: If the roll succeeds, everyone in the Company regains 1 Hope.

events.detail: Tame beast - A beast suddenly self-tames and becomes friendly
events.result: If the roll succeeds, everyone in the Company regains 1 Hope.

events.detail: Rare prey - Very rare prey (like a white stag)
events.result: If the roll succeeds, everyone in the Company regains 1 Hope.

events.details: Trap - Overlooked a trap
events.result: If the roll fails, the target is Wounded

events.details: Nightly Encounter - Don’t fall asleep during watch
events.result: If the roll fails, the target is Wounded

events.details: Dangerous Spot - The look-out spot collapses, is slippery or faulty
events.result: If the roll fails, the target is Wounded

events.details: Hidden Hazard - Awareness to avoid stumbling into danger
events.result: If the roll fails, the target is Wounded

events.details: Warning Shot - Trespassed into a forbidden area
events.result: If the roll fails, the target is Wounded

events.details: Stalking Enemy - Spot the foul presence
events.result: If the roll fails, the target is Wounded

events.details: Enemy Tracks - Hide from the Enemy
events.result: If the roll fails, everyone in the Company gains 1 Shadow point (Dread).

events.details: Betrayed - False advice leads to peril
events.result: If the roll fails, everyone in the Company gains 1 Shadow point (Dread).

events.details: Nightmarish Presence - Awareness to sense the danger
events.result: If the roll fails, everyone in the Company gains 1 Shadow point (Dread).

events.details: Blighted Area - Try to avoid it and warn others
events.result: If the roll fails, everyone in the Company gains 1 Shadow point (Dread).

events.details: Poor Folk - It is too dangerous/impossible to help someone
events.result: If the roll fails, everyone in the Company gains 1 Shadow point (Dread).

events.details: Grisly Scene - Awareness to be forewarned
events.result: If the roll fails, everyone in the Company gains 1 Shadow point (Dread).

events.details: Awful Spot - Avoiding danger leads to an awful camp spot
events.result: If the roll fails, the target gains 1 Shadow point (Dread).

events.details: Paranoid - Mistrust and worries paralyse the Look-out
events.result: If the roll fails, the target gains 1 Shadow point (Dread).

events.details: Overlooked Hazard - Awareness to escape safely
events.result: If the roll fails, the target gains 1 Shadow point (Dread).

events.details: Misjudged Encounter - An encounter turns poorly
events.result: If the roll fails, the target gains 1 Shadow point (Dread).

events.details: Shadowed - Does someone follow the Company?
events.result: If the roll fails, the target gains 1 Shadow point (Dread).

events.details: Haunting Visions - Awareness to overcome darkness
events.result: If the roll fails, the target gains 1 Shadow point (Dread).

events.details: Overcautious - Leads to a long detour
events.result: If the roll fails, add 1 day to the length of the journey, and the target gains 1 additional Fatigue.

events.details: Dull Blades - Equipment is uncared for, needs tending
events.result: If the roll fails, add 1 day to the length of the journey, and the target gains 1 additional Fatigue.

events.details: Obstructed Path - Awareness to spot a way around
events.result: If the roll fails, add 1 day to the length of the journey, and the target gains 1 additional Fatigue.

events.details: Wrong Watch - Everyone needs more sleep
events.result: If the roll fails, add 1 day to the length of the journey, and the target gains 1 additional Fatigue.

events.details: Hunt Thieves - Thieves steal something from camp
events.result: If the roll fails, add 1 day to the length of the journey, and the target gains 1 additional Fatigue.

events.details: Wandering Enemies - Awareness to sense their coming
events.result: If the roll fails, add 1 day to the length of the journey, and the target gains 1 additional Fatigue.

events.details: Hidden Path - The Look-out discovers a hidden path
events.result: If the roll succeeds, reduce the length of the journey by 1 day.

events.details: Distant Sounds - A river or village noises help a quicker orientation
events.result: If the roll succeeds, reduce the length of the journey by 1 day.

events.details: Helpful Tracks - Awareness to follow the tracks
events.result: If the roll succeeds, reduce the length of the journey by 1 day.

events.details: Good Vantage - The Look-out locates a shorter path
events.result: If the roll succeeds, reduce the length of the journey by 1 day.

events.details: Distant Signs - Smoke or other signals lead to a better path
events.result: If the roll succeeds, reduce the length of the journey by 1 day.

events.details: Waypoint - Awareness to recognize the landmark
events.result: If the roll succeeds, reduce the length of the journey by 1 day.

events.details: Person in Need - The Look-out finds a person in need off the path
events.result: If the roll succeeds, reduce the length of the journey by 1 day.

events.details: Shy Other - Awareness to spot them
events.result: If the roll succeeds, reduce the length of the journey by 1 day.

events.details: Discreet Watcher - Awareness to spot them
events.result: If the roll succeeds, reduce the length of the journey by 1 day.

events.details: Band of Warriors - Trade stories, get equipment repaired
events.result: If the roll succeeds, reduce the length of the journey by 1 day.

events.details: Secluded Home - A hidden home, like a hut, tree house or cave
events.result: If the roll succeeds, reduce the length of the journey by 1 day.

events.details: Auspicious Gathering - Some ritual or ceremony of local people
events.result: If the roll succeeds, reduce the length of the journey by 1 day.

events.details: Playful Animals - Like fireflies, river otters, colourful songbirds
events.result: If the roll succeeds, everyone in the Company regains 1 Hope.

events.details: Wandering Elves - Almost silently, the Look-out might still notice them
events.result: If the roll succeeds, everyone in the Company regains 1 Hope.

events.details: Benevolent Being - Awareness to sense their presence
events.result: If the roll succeeds, everyone in the Company regains 1 Hope.

events.details: Natural Phenomenon - Breathtaking beauty
events.result: If the roll succeeds, everyone in the Company regains 1 Hope.

events.details: Music - The Look-Out hears pleasant music
